TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits1 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a totalDigits-1.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 1.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short totalDigits-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 4 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-totalDigits-1 element, sets the values: -9, 0, 9 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short totalDigits-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 4 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-totalDigits-1 element, sets the values: -32768, -1000, -100, -10, 32767, 1000, 100, 10 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short totalDigits-1.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-totalDigits-1 type, sets the values: -9, 0, 9 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short totalDigits-1.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-totalDigits-1 type, sets the values: -32768, -1000, -100, -10, 32767, 1000, 100, 10 and expects validation to fail.
